channel.title: Want a flashback? Lets all play Allstar-Scape!
channel.description:
[CENTER]~ Allstar-scape ~
[B]Yes, I know you're probably like WTF why?! Are you serious? But just listen.. I felt like putting this online on a 24/7 hosted VPS for maybe less than a week unless people demand it stay on. I felt like maybe people would like to re-live some old good memories, as I feel like doing. But I felt like doing it with other players who may feel the same. So come on in, and join us and play and re-live some memories! :P[/B]
~ Download HERE ~
[URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/74239750/Stupit's%20Client.rar"]Stupit's Client![/URL] <-- CLICK HERE (Mirror 1: [url=http://"http://uppit.com/jwadh63we0yx/Stupit's_Client.rar"]UppIT[/url]) [B]*** (Server IP: allstarscape.zapto.org) ***[/B]
~ Features ~
- 24/7 VPS! - 100% credits to Mod Allstar and Stupit for the client! - 100% original Allstar-scape! - Original Training! - And just the old fashioned features of great ol' Allstar-scape!
[B]Many of my good old friends have been talking about the good old Allstar-scape days so I told them I'd host it on one of my VPS's for them so why not everyone else to whoever wants to play with us? I miss these days myself so why not re-live it for a little? So are you bored? Come on over and just hangout and chat![/B]
~ Media ~
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2qsnct5.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/jtxydx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1q282e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/35jwemh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/m7dzs4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/69281u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2v81rmt.png[/img]
100% credits to Mod Allstar & Stupit [B]Hate as much as you want, I'm doing this for ME and anyone else who would enjoy to play! :) EVERYBODY welcome![/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Want a flashback? Lets all play Allstar-Scape!
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

The only thing that lets it down is the ugly looking client. I never played an allstar but I support the older versions of RSPS. We even have nostalgia in RSPS now, not just RuneScape. Time certainly goes by fast.

Read full topic

item.title: Want a flashback? Lets all play Allstar-Scape!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“hereigoagain, post:27, topic:459696”][size=24pt]~ Allstar-scape is getting updated! ~[/size]

[size=18pt]Because of the amount of players that seem to enjoy playing Allstar-scape currently have been requesting to get rid of the dupes, build somewhat of an economy, and fix just some of the simple shit up, ya know? Well I took it into consideration and am currently working on a updated version of Allstar-scape. Here is a list of the current new features:[/size]

Anti Syi
Anti trade & telegrab dupe!
Many bugs, dupes, & glitches we’re fixed.
New Player List (Ranks inc.)
All skills trainable until level 130!
and much much more!

[size=24pt]~ But here’s the catch… ~[/size]

[size=18pt]In order to upgrade to this source, i have to reset and remove and restart fresh with all new characters.
So are you ready to make the switch? Should we do this or no? YOU guys have to tell me! I go by what
you guys tell me.[/size]

[size=12pt]So please reply below and tell me what you want![/size][/quote]

He thinks he has to reset character files

SURE IS PALIDINO76 IN HERE.

Read full topic
item.source: Want a flashback? Lets all play Allstar-Scape!

@hereigoagain wrote:

[size=24pt]~ Allstar-scape is getting updated! ~[/size]

[size=18pt]Because of the amount of players that seem to enjoy playing Allstar-scape currently have been requesting to get rid of the dupes, build somewhat of an economy, and fix just some of the simple shit up, ya know? Well I took it into consideration and am currently working on a updated version of Allstar-scape. Here is a list of the current new features:[/size]

Anti Syi
Anti trade & telegrab dupe!
Many bugs, dupes, & glitches we’re fixed.
New Player List (Ranks inc.)
All skills trainable until level 130!
and much much more!

[size=24pt]~ But here’s the catch… ~[/size]

[size=18pt]In order to upgrade to this source, i have to reset and remove and restart fresh with all new characters.
So are you ready to make the switch? Should we do this or no? YOU guys have to tell me! I go by what
you guys tell me.[/size]

[size=12pt]So please reply below and tell me what you want![/size]

Read full topic
